page_content: The page discusses a safety initiative for first-grade students involving the distribution of red caps.
The page discusses issues related to the admission exams for the first grade of the gymnasium in the Canton of Graubünden.
The page reports an incident in Samedan where a car caused a collision and touched a pedestrian.
The page discusses various decisions made by the Bündner Regierung, including grants for water supply projects and roadworks.
The page details an inter-cantonal avalanche dog handler course conducted by the police and border guard corps.
